text: Ernst Fivian (12 August 1931 â€“ 15 December 2021) was a Swiss gymnast. He competed in the 1952 and 1960 Summer Olympics, winning a silver medal in 1952. Fivian died on 15 December 2021, at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swiss gymnasts Category:Olympic silver medalists for Switzerland
title: Ernst Fivian
